app_descript:
Protect Scotland

Brief: Protect Scotland is a health and safety app designed to curtail the spread of COVID-19 by utilizing Bluetooth technology. It offers a unique approach to contact tracing, seamlessly connecting and protecting Scottish citizens while preserving their anonymity.
